title: Art survives the times
brief_description: A record of art life in France. Leading artists such as Matisse, Picasso, Ultrillo and the sculptors, Roualt, Laurens and Janniot, are shown at work. The architects, Le Corbusier and Perret, also display plans for homes and cities. No other credits available.
